sentences.en: " Don't you bother about those people out there, " he said at parting.
sentences.cn: “ 不要为那些人烦恼, " 分手时他说,"我会帮你的.

sentences.en: an emotional parting at the airport
Buyers might require further assurances before parting with their cash.
sentences.cn: 买方在付现之前可能要求提供进一步的担保。

sentences.en: He beguiled me into parting with the gemstone.
sentences.cn: 他诱骗我把那枚宝石割爱。

sentences.en: He had been stoical at their parting.
sentences.cn: 他们分手时他表现得很坦然。

sentences.en: He said no more until their final parting.
sentences.cn: 直到他们最后分手时他才又说了几句话.

sentences.en: Her parting words left him feeling empty and alone.
sentences.cn: 她分手时说的话让他感觉空虚孤独。

sentences.en: It was a dreadfully emotional parting.
sentences.cn: 那是一次非常动情的分别。

sentences.en: Many of the things are of great sentimental value and it is going to be a wrench parting with them.
sentences.cn: 其中很多东西都具有重要的情感价值，令人难以割舍。

sentences.en: Miss Su's parting manner dampened Fang Hung - chien's high spirits.
sentences.cn: 苏小姐临别时的态度,冷缩了方鸿 渐 的高兴.

sentences.en: Parting with her mother was a great wrench.
sentences.cn: 同母亲分别对她是极大的痛苦.

sentences.en: She cried out for anguish at parting.
sentences.cn: 分手时,她由于痛苦而失声大哭.

sentences.en: the best course is to seek an amicable parting of the ways.
sentences.cn: 最好的途径是寻找一个折衷的抉择时刻。

sentences.en: The parting from his sister had a positive effect on John.
sentences.cn: 和姐姐分开对约翰来说有好处。

sentences.en: The promise of huge profits seduced him into parting with his money.
sentences.cn: 高额利润的许诺诱使他把钱出了手。

words.tran_cn: 划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物
分开（part的过去式及过去分词）
划分（partition的过去分词）；分割；把…分成部分

phrases.tran_cn: 岔路口，十字路口；关键时刻，需要作出重大抉择的时刻
转折点：分岔点，尤指需要作出重大决择的时刻
n. 临告别时的最后一句话、特别表情或行为

trans.tran_cn: 临别的，临别纪念的，分离的，分隔的，将要过去的，临终的，临死的
trans.tran_en: Your parting words or actions are the things that you say or do as you are leaving a place or person

trans.tran_cn: 分别，离别，分界线，分界点，分离，分裂
trans.tran_en: an occasion when two people leave each other
